message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110. What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $105. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit away from my target. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already given you a great deal, and I think $105 is a fair price for this product. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider selling it to someone else.
